channel.title: Programming on The Thinking Tree
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on The Thinking Tree

item.title: Carbon Monoxide: To Boldly Go Where NO Has Gone Before.
item.description: We have created a framework for analyzing subscription based businesses in terms of a unified metric which we call SCV (single customer value). The major advance in this paper is to model customer churn as an exponential decay variable, which directly follows from experimental data relating to subscription based businesses.
